item.title: 俄罗斯石油在地中海找到新的转换地点
item.description: 在希腊海军的压力下，俄罗斯石油贸易商在地中海找到了一个新的原油转运地，这表明要取缔这一令监管机构和欧洲各国政府都感到震惊的活动有多么困难。【原文：Under pressure from Greece’s navy, traders of Russian oil have found a new place to switch cargoes of crude in the Mediterranean sea, a sign of how hard it will be to clamp down on an activity that has alarmed regulators and European governments alike.】

item.title: 墨西哥大选获胜后比索跌幅扩大至 2
item.description: 墨西哥比索跌幅扩大，兑美元汇率下跌超过 2%，因为初步选举结果显示执政党以压倒性优势获胜，这可能使其有能力加强国家对经济的控制。【原文：Mexico’s peso extended its decline, weakening more than 2% against the dollar, as preliminary election results showed the ruling party winning in a landslide that could empower it to increase state control of the economy.】

item.title: 养老院运营商拉维护理中心申请破产
item.description: 拉维护理中心有限责任公司（LaVie Care Centers LLC）运营着 43 家养老院和辅助生活设施，包括 Consulate Health Care 等名称，该公司成为最新一家申请破产保护的连锁企业，因为该行业正努力应对高昂的劳动力成本、较低的入住率和不均衡的报销率。【原文：LaVie Care Centers LLC, which operates 43 nursing homes and assisted living facilities under names including Consulate Health Care, became the latest chain to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy as the industry grapples with high labor costs, lower occupancy and uneven reimbursement rates.】

item.title: 摩洛哥皇家航空公司正在洽谈 200 架波音、空客和巴西航空工业公司喷气机事宜
item.description: 摩洛哥皇家航空公司正在评估空中客车公司（Airbus SE）、波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Royal Air Maroc is evaluating bids from Airbus SE, Boeing Co. and Embraer as it looks to place an order for almost 200 jets by September.】

item.title: 大选推动新兴市场货币波动，股市反弹
item.description: 今年以来，新兴市场股票在中国经济数据利好后涨幅最大，印度、墨西哥和南非的选举结果也导致货币市场大幅波动。【原文：Emerging-market equities jumped the most this year after favorable data on the Chinese economy, with election results from India, Mexico and South Africa causing wide swings in currency markets.】

item.title: 前千年交易员梅吉亚以 50 亿美元成立自己的对冲基金
item.description: 千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）的前高级交易员迭戈-梅吉亚（Diego Megia）以 50 亿美元启动了他的新对冲基金，并在第一天就向新资金关闭了基金，成为近年来最大的初创公司之一。【原文：Millennium Management’s former senior trader Diego Megia kicked off his new hedge fund with $5 billion and closed it to new money on the very first day, becoming one of the largest startups in recent years.】

item.title: 摩根大通和摩根士丹利对股票收益前景看法不一
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.摩根士丹利的同行却不这么认为。【原文：Investors betting on further US equity gains over the coming months will be disappointed, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. Their peers at Morgan Stanley disagree.】

item.title: 法航-荷航即使称赞合并也不会重提 ITA
item.description: 法航荷航集团首席执行官本-史密斯（Ben Smith）表示，即使在德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）收购意大利航空公司ITA Airways失败的情况下，他也不太可能重新考虑这家航空公司。【原文：Air France-KLM Group Chief Executive Officer Ben Smith signaled he’s unlikely to take another look at Italian carrier ITA Airways, even if the airline comes back on the market in the event of a failed takeover bid by Deutsche Lufthansa AG.】

item.title: 时钟塔称国债面临特朗普大选 "灾难 "风险
item.description: Clocktower Group 的数据显示，如果唐纳德-特朗普领导的共和党获胜的几率继续上升，十年期国债收益率在美国大选前有接近 5%的风险。【原文：Ten-year Treasury yields are at risk of approaching 5% ahead of the US election, if the odds of a Donald Trump-led Republican victory continue to rise, according to Clocktower Group.】

item.title: 即使信贷损失飙升，Monzo 仍首次实现盈利
item.description: Monzo Bank Ltd.报告称，在去年收入翻了一番多之后，该公司首次实现了年度盈利，尽管该公司为价值超过其贷款额十分之一的不良贷款提取了准备金。【原文：Monzo Bank Ltd. reported its first annual profit after more than doubling its revenue last year, though it made provisions for bad loans worth more than a tenth of its lending book.】

item.title: 德国部长预计欧洲央行将很快降息，希望后续有更多降息举措
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）表示，他希望在欧洲央行本周开始其广受期待的货币宽松周期后，会有更多的降息举措。【原文：German Economy Minister Robert Habeck said he hopes more interest-rate cuts will follow after the European Central Bank begins its widely anticipated monetary easing cycle this week.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，申银万国计划近日在伦敦上市
item.description: 据天空新闻报道，在线时尚零售商 Shein 将于近日在伦敦申请首次公开募股。【原文：Online fashion retailer Shein is set to file for an initial public offering in London in the coming days, according to Sky News.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克暴跌，因为制药商必须面对特拉华州的善达案
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）的股价在法院作出裁决后暴跌，法院裁定这家英国制药商必须与赛诺菲等其他制药商一道，接受有关前胃灼热治疗药物Zantac是否致癌的审判。【原文：GSK Plc shares plunged in the wake of a court ruling that the UK drugmaker, alongside others including Sanofi, must face trials over whether the former heartburn treatment Zantac causes cancer.】

item.title: 阿提哈德首席执行官称股票上市计划进展顺利
item.description: 阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）正在推进可能的首次公开募股，这是中东地区大型航空公司的首次公开募股。【原文：Etihad Airways is moving along with a possible initial public offering, the first for a major airline in the Middle East, in a listing that would help the Abu Dhabi flag carrier raise additional funds to expand.】

item.title: 土耳其通胀率高达 75%，但最严重的危机可能已经过去
item.description: 土耳其上个月的通胀加速超过了预期，官员们希望这标志着长达数年的生活费用危机的最坏时期已经过去。【原文：Turkey’s inflation accelerated more than forecast last month, in what officials hope marks the worst of a yearslong cost-of-living crisis.】

item.title: 个人电脑制造商树莓派和支持者在英国罕见的首次公开募股中寻求 1.57 亿英镑的投资
item.description: 英国个人电脑制造商树莓派（Raspberry Pi）及其股东正寻求通过在伦敦首次公开募股筹集1.57亿英镑（约合2亿美元），这为科技企业在金融中心上市带来了一线希望。【原文：British personal computer maker Raspberry Pi and its shareholders are looking to raise £157 million ($200 million) via an initial public offering in London, offering a ray of hope for tech listings in the financial hub.】

item.title: 品牌商务园成为写字楼痛苦中难得的亮点
item.description: 一家品牌商业和工业园区的业主报告称，由于租金快速上涨抵消了利率上升的影响，因此估值有所提高。【原文：A landlord for branded business and industrial parks reported higher valuations as rapidly rising rents offset the impact of higher interest rates.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索下滑，执政党大跌令投资者恐慌
item.description: 墨西哥比索下跌，扭转了早些时候的涨势，因为初步选举结果显示执政党以压倒性优势获胜，这可能使其有能力加强国家对经济的控制，削弱对其权力的制约。【原文：Mexico’s peso slipped, reversing earlier gains as preliminary election results showed the ruling party winning in a landslide that could empower it to increase state control of the economy and undermine checks on its power.】

item.title: 沙特阿美通过在美国和伦敦的路演吸引外国投资者
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）的高层管理人员将在伦敦和美国举行一系列活动，为这家石油巨头价值 120 亿美元的股票出售拉动需求。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s top executives are set to hold a series of events in London and the US to drum up demand for the oil giant’s $12 billion share sale, five years after it scrapped an international roadshow for its initial public offering.】

item.title: 挪威意外停气导致供应减少，欧洲天然气市场大幅上涨
item.description: 由于挪威天然气流量在计划外停运中下滑，欧洲天然气价格飙升。【原文：European natural gas prices surged as Norwegian flows slumped amid unplanned outages.】

item.title: 斯蒂芬-罗奇重返香港，为严峻的前景 "面对音乐
item.description: 经济学家斯蒂芬-罗奇（Stephen Roach）在首次访问中国香港时坚持他对香港和中国的悲观看法，此前他的尖锐言论引起了前官员的反驳，并在北京的一次重要会议上被下达了明显的禁言令。【原文：Economist Stephen Roach held firm to his gloomy view on Hong Kong and China on his first trip to the city after his sharp comments spurred rebuttals from former officials and an apparent gag order during a major Beijing conference.】

item.title: 冰岛央行行长称美联储的 "强硬 "政策使其工作更轻松
item.description: 冰岛央行行长表示，美国联邦储备委员会 "强硬 "的政策立场为他的工作提供了顺风，使这个岛国的利率达到了西欧最高的 9.25%。【原文：Iceland’s central bank governor said a “tough” policy stance from the US Federal Reserve provides a tailwind for his work that has taken interest rates in the island nation to a western European high of 9.25%.】

item.title: 尽管石油价格波动，富时 100 指数仍有望继续上涨
巴基斯坦通胀率创新高，放缓幅度超预期
item.description: 在巴基斯坦中央银行将利率维持在创纪录水平近一年之际，由于国内粮食供应改善和燃料成本下降，巴基斯坦的通货膨胀率连续第五个月下降。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation pace eased for the fifth straight month as domestic food supplies improved and fuel costs fell at a time when the central bank has kept interest rates at a record for nearly a year.】

item.title: 南非大选后的纷争让投资者无所适从
item.description: 上周的选举没有产生绝对的赢家，而正在进行的联合谈判的结果仍存在很大的不确定性，因此投资者为南非金融市场的进一步动荡做好了准备。【原文：Investors braced for further upheaval in South Africa’s financial markets in the wake of last week’s elections that produced no outright winner, with the outcome of ongoing coalition talks remaining highly uncertain.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会预测 2024 年航空公司有望实现 300 亿美元利润
item.description: 国际航空运输协会预测，今年全球航空业的净收入将达到 305 亿美元，原因是机票价格上涨以及大流行病后人们对旅行的持续渴望。【原文：The global airline industry is set to generate $30.5 billion in net income this year, the International Air Transport Association predicted, amid higher ticket prices and a continued desire to travel following the pandemic.】

item.title: 印度出口民调显示莫迪获胜，基础设施、国营企业成大赢家
item.description: 由于出口民调预测印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的执政党将取得压倒性胜利，印度国营企业和基础设施相关公司的股票表现突出。【原文：Shares of Indian state-run companies and infrastructure-related firms are standing out as exit polls predict a landslide victory for Prime Narendra Modi’s ruling party.】

item.title: 暂停 10 个月后中国提高海外投资限制
item.description: 自 7 月份以来，中国首次取消了对外国证券投资的上限，此举可能有助于满足对海外资产激增的部分需求，即使中国政府正努力支持国内市场。【原文：China lifted a cap on foreign securities investment for the first time since July, in a move that may help satisfy some of the surging demand for overseas assets even as Beijing seeks to bolster domestic markets.】
